text:
Hi <@U03FJQPSC0Y>

I was trying to get to clear the form fields in the Custom CRM card project but nowhere in the documentation I could find a way. When one click the Action button and server less hook executes I need to clear the form fields of existing values and show a new loaded form.

Below is exact same query which was raised. Do we have any update on this feature??

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/Section-content-refresh-after-serverless-function-hook/td-p/715598>
Basically this still an issue, and currently they don't have a timeline for the fix

Thanks <@U01QVR44MEY> for the quick response.
 It's sad its still WIP , and that it was something basic we need in forms

Thanks, Carter, you pretty much summed up everything I’d said. <@U04LFJS2001> I hear you, form reset is very basic, and it makes sense to expect. It’s taking longer than we planned for, Thank you for your patience, while we work to solve for this.

Hi team

I would like to request your advice. I work like developer in a commercial area and recently we have been to migrate some pages at HubSpot. Now I know that HubSpot has HubDB but it isn´t develop for keep sensitive data also It isn´t possible to keep a session like in a server. So, my question is, It´s a good idea migrate a site that has transactional tasks like payments, upload documents, requests to another services, etc? or maybe for that cases is better keep the site in GCP for example?
Maybe it´s impossible keep a site of this kind in HubSpot.

Thanks for your time.
